name: Karkade (Sudanese Hibiscus Tea)
description: A traditional Sudanese hibiscus drink served chilled, perfect for hot days and special occasions.
directions: Rinse hibiscus petals in cold water to clean
Boil 1 cup of water, then add hibiscus petals
Let simmer for 10-15min until the water is a deep red
Strain the petals out and stir in sugar while the tea is still warm
Let it cool, then refrigerate and serve over ice
